### Database Constraint Verification
```sql
SELECT indexname, indexdef FROM pg_indexes
WHERE tablename = 'BOMVersion' AND indexname = 'one_active_bom_per_sku';

       indexname        |                                      indexdef
------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 one_active_bom_per_sku | CREATE UNIQUE INDEX one_active_bom_per_sku ON public."BOMVersion" USING btree ("skuId") WHERE ("isActive" = true)
```
